content.sql:
WITH START_TIME AS (
SELECT min(dds.BILL_DATE) AS sTime, ms.STORE_ID, dc.client_id FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds --关联门店 LEFT JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dsm.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code --关联客户端、经销商 INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID --INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID and md.CHECK_DATE IS NOT NULL --关联组织 --INNER JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID = md.ORG_ID
WHERE dds.STATE=1
GROUP BY ms.STORE_ID, dc.client_id
),END_TIME AS (
SELECT MAX(dds.BILL_DATE) AS eTime, ms.STORE_ID, dc.client_id FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds --关联门店 LEFT JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dsm.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code --关联客户端、经销商 INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID --INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID and md.CHECK_DATE IS NOT NULL --关联组织 --INNER JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID = md.ORG_ID
WHERE dds.STATE=1 GROUP BY ms.STORE_ID, dc.client_id
),base AS (
SELECT isnull(o.pn2,'') AS PN2,--大区 isnull(o.pn3,'') AS PN3,--区域 isnull(o.pn4,'') AS PN4,--省份 isnull(bdi1.item_name,'') AS PN5,--城市 bdi1.item_alias AS item_alias, md.DIST_CODE AS DIST_CODE,--经销商代码 md.DIST_NAME AS DIST_NAME,--经销商名称 dds.store_CODE AS STORE_CODE,--经销商客户代码 dds.store_name AS STORE_NAME,--经销商客户名称 ms.store_id AS STORE_ID, dc.CLIENT_ID AS CLIENT_ID, isnull(ms.STORE_CODE,'') AS STORECODE,--JDES II客户代码 isnull(ms.STORE_NAME,'') AS STORENAME,--JDES II客户名称 isnull(dds1.store_addr,'') AS STORE_ADDR,--详细地址(街道) isnull(dds1.tel,'') AS STORE_TEL,--电话 isnull(ms.memo4,'') AS PEOPLE,--销售人员 isnull(dds1.contact,'') AS CONTACT,--联系人 isnull(bdi.ITEM_NAME,'') AS CHANNEL,--渠道 isnull(bdi2.ITEM_NAME,'') as TYPE, CASE WHEN dds1.state='1' THEN '有效' ELSE '无效' END AS STORE_STATE,--门店状态 ms.memo1,--强生客户代码 ms.memo2,--强生客户名称 ms.memo3, ms.memo4, ms.memo5, dds1.CREATE_TIME AS create_time,--创建时间 dds1.UPDATE_TIME AS update_time,--修改时间 isnull(dds1.REMARK,'') AS remark--备注 FROM DMS_ACTIVE_STORE dds LEFT JOIN DMS_DATA_STORE dds1 ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dds1.CLIENT_ID AND dds.STORE_CODE=dds1.STORE_CODE AND dds.STORE_NAME = DDS1.STORE_NAME --关联门店 LEFT JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dsm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.STORE_NAME = DSM.DIST_STORE_NAME LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.target_store_code LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi ON bdi.DICT_ITEM_ID=ms.TYPE_ID AND bdi.DICT_ID='storeType' LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM bdi2 ON bdi2.DICT_ITEM_ID=ms.CHANNEL_ID AND bdi2.DICT_ID='storeChannel' --关联客户端、经销商 LEFT JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID = dc.CLIENT_ID and dc.CLIENT_ID is not null LEFT JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID and md.DIST_ID is not null --关联组织 LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG o ON o.ORG_ID = md.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN base_dict_item bdi1 ON bdi1.DICT_ITEM_ID = MD.GEO_ID AND bdi1.DICT_ID='geography' WHERE dds.STATE=1 $orgId$ $storeTypeId$ $channelId$ $customerCode$ $customerName$ $distId$ $distCode$
)
SELECT s.pn2,--大区 s.pn3,--区域 s.pn4,--省份 s.pn5,--城市 s.item_alias,--城市类别 s.DIST_CODE,--经销商代码 s.DIST_NAME,--经销商名称 s.store_CODE,--经销商客户代码 s.store_name,--经销商客户名称 s.STORECODE,--JDES II客户代码(强生客户代码) s.STORENAME,--JDES II客户名称(强生客户名称) s.memo1,--强生客户代码 s.memo2,--强生客户名称 s.STORE_ADDR,--详细地址(街道) s.STORE_TEL,--电话 s.PEOPLE,--销售人员 s.CONTACT,--联系人 s.CHANNEL,--渠道 s.TYPE, s.STORE_STATE,--门店状态 s.memo3, s.memo4, s.memo5, isnull(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), s.create_time, 120 ),''),--创建时间 isnull(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), s.update_time, 120 ),''),--修改时间 isnull(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), st.sTime, 120 ),''),--首次交易日期, isnull(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), et.eTime, 120 ),''),--最近一次交易日期 s.REMARK AS remark --备注 FROM base s LEFT JOIN START_TIME st ON st.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID AND st.CLIENT_ID = s.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN end_time et ON et.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID AND et.CLIENT_ID = s.CLIENT_ID
